item.title: BeforeAll and AfterAll workaround for cucumber-java
item.description: As a cucumber-jvm user, I’ve always felt the need for a @BeforeAll and @AfterAll hooks. Although, cucumber still does not have a support for this yet, there’re many ways to workaround.
